title: Post Test
subtitle: Interim Requirements for Quality Records Training
instructions: Remember: For multiple choice questions, there may be multiple selections to answer the question correctly.

questions.question: When creating a Quality Record you may use which of the following:
When should you begin using the training covered in this course?
options: Immediately after this training is completed
When you have been trained on and requested to implement PPIFs that generate Quality Records

questions.question: True or False: The only way to correct an electronic Quality Record is to document the appropriate information about the correction in a log, sign and date the log entry, and make the correction in the electronic system
Quality Records may be filed
options: In a department central file area

questions.question: Quality Records are?
options: The historical proof that demonstrate the execution of activities typically described by Quality System documents.
All Philip Morris records generated after the implementation of the Quality System.

questions.question: True or False: When correcting a Quality Record you may erase the incorrect information and write the correct information on the record.
True or False: If no information is required in a particular space on a Quality System form, you may leave it
When creating a Quality Record you must comply with:
options: The training described in this course.
All instructions, procedures, and training requirements associated with the record.
